text: The Colbys was an American primetime soap opera. It was a spin-off of Dynasty. It aired on ABC from November 1985 to March 1987. The stars of the series included Charlton Heston, John James, Emma Samms, Maxwell Caulfield, and Stephanie Beacham. This show was focused on the fictional rich Colby family from Los Angeles, California. == Other websites == * Category:1985 American television series debuts Category:1987 American television series endings Category:1980s American drama television series Category:Television series set in Los Angeles Category:English-language television programs
title: The Colbys
